long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Rescuers is an exhilarating and heart-pounding mobile game that puts players in the role of brave rescuers tasked with saving lives in various challenging scenarios. With its intense gameplay and immersive mechanics, Rescuers offers a thrilling experience that tests players' reflexes, strategic thinking, and ability to handle pressure in high-stakes situations.

In Rescuers, players step into the shoes of courageous first responders, including firefighters, paramedics, and search-and-rescue teams, as they navigate through dynamic environments filled with dangers and obstacles. The game features a series of gripping missions set in diverse locations such as burning buildings, collapsed structures, and natural disaster zones.
